message:
Unearthed Reality

Revelations occur all under thought,
Accounting nature's subtle knots.
Tools of logic, steadily brought,
Illumination's bidding sought.
Observing truths, in queries caught.
Notions shaped, ideas wrought.
Allaying fears of minds distraught, 
Lesser dragons, one has fought.
Incredulity, sometimes fraught,
Seeks constant remembrance, sparing naught,
Manifesting in every thought.
